data.title: 3 Safe Dividend-Paying Tech Stocks to Buy for Coronavirus Volatility
data.text: Three safe-haven, dividend-paying tech stocks that should help investors weather the current coronavirus storm. They might also prove to be steals at their current prices six months or a year from now, even if the market slips again.

data.title: Amazon ‘bid high and lost’ on JEDI, Microsoft says after release of DoD watchdog report
data.text: Microsoft took aim at Amazon in a blog post Wednesday, accusing its rival of seeking an unfair advantage as the two companies lock horns over the Pentagon’s JEDI contract.

data.title: Microsoft (MSFT) Stock Moves -1.05%: What You Should Know
data.text: Microsoft (MSFT) closed the most recent trading day at $171.88, moving -1.05% from the previous trading session.

data.title: Jeff Bezos and Satya Nadella join White House’s coronavirus industry groups
data.text: Amazon CEO Jeff Bezos and President Donald Trump aren’t exactly the best of friends, but that didn’t stop the White House from including the world’s richest individual on a list of industry leaders working with Trump to bring about a “Great American Economic Revival.

data.title: Microsoft and GE Healthcare Team Up to Make COVID-19 Patient Monitoring Software
data.text: The cloud offering will enable healthcare professionals to monitor virus patients remotely, including ones on a ventilator.

data.title: Pentagon Watchdog Finds No Smoking Gun in Investigation of $10 Billion JEDI Award
data.text: The Inspector General did say it was blocked from interviewing key witnesses able to discuss potential White House influence on the deal.

data.title: As world is consumed by coronavirus, Microsoft launches biodiversity initiative to address challenges that will outlast COVID-19
data.text: Microsoft today announced a new environmental initiative focused on biodiversity, seeking to address the growing but often overlooked threat of disappearing wildlife species and the unraveling of ecosystems that sustain human, animal and plant life in forests, grasslands and coral reefs around the globe.

data.title: DoD watchdog sanctions JEDI award to Microsoft over Amazon, calls bias claims unfounded
data.text: A new report by the Defense Department’s inspector general found no evidence that President Donald Trump improperly influenced the award of a coveted military cloud contract to Microsoft over rival Amazon.

data.title: DoD Inspector General report finds everything was basically hunky-dory with JEDI cloud contract bid
data.text: While controversy has dogged the $10 billion, decade-long JEDI contract since its earliest days, a report by the DoD’s Inspector General’s Office concluded today that, while there were some funky bits and potential conflicts, overall the contract procurement process was fair and legal and  the president did not unduly influence the process in spite of […]

data.title: IG report: Some ethical violations, but JEDI outcome not affected
data.text: CNBC's Ylan Mui delivers the latest on the inspector general report on the outcome of the JEDI contract, which was awarded to Microsoft instead of Amazon.

data.title: 9 Robust Stocks to Buy to Survive a Bear Market
data.text: With the markets providing many discounts, contrarians may just want to dive right in. However, going with the most well-rounded and relevant names could be the smarter choice.

data.title: 5 Stocks to Navigate the Coronavirus Earnings Season

data.title: Pentagon probe unable to rule out White House influence on JEDI contract
data.text: The Pentagon's inspector general on Wednesday said it could not determine whether the White House influenced the award of a $10 billion contract to Microsoft Corp  over Amazon  after several officials said their conversations were privileged "presidential communications."

data.title: Microsoft Teams integration helps drive demand for RealWear’s head-mounted industrial devices
data.text: As many tech startups scramble to cut expenses and find new revenue streams amid the COVID-19 outbreak, RealWear is dealing with just the opposite. The Vancouver, Wash.

data.title: GE Healthcare and Microsoft are bringing a COVID-19 patient monitoring tool to health systems
data.text: GE Healthcare is extending its longtime collaboration with Microsoft to launch a cloud-based COVID-19 patient monitoring software for health systems. GE Healthcare had originally intended to debut its Mural Virtual Care Solution at the Healthcare Information and Management Systems Society meeting earlier this year.

data.title: 6 Stocks Aiding Indexes to Exit Bear-Market Territory
data.text: Major indexes entered into the bear-market territory during Mar 9-10. As on Apr 14, all three major stock indexes are out of the bear-market territory.

data.title: Zoom vs. Microsoft Teams: How to choose the best video chat app for working from home
data.text: The coronavirus pandemic has many people staying home and connecting with coworkers through video chat. Here are two options for staying in touch.
